Description_lang: Braunpyke creates a burning pyre containing $s1 charges that last for $446379d. Each time a player comes into contact with the pyre, a charge is consumed, the player is affected by $@spellname446403 and causing the pyre to erupt in holy energy, inflicting $1218149s1 damage to all players.While empowered by $@spellname422969, $@spellname446368 has $s2 charges.
